author: fwyzard
body:
Era-based customisation to adapt the 2017 HLT menu to the 2016 detector configuration

This adds a new `HLT_2016` era modifier to collect all HLT changes that should be applied for 2016 era, but should *not* be inherited by the 2017 and later eras.

The HF local reconstruction is reverted to the 2016 configuration.
The HBHE local reconstruction is kept as in 2017, given that the new modules should be able to handle both the "Phase 0" and "Phase 1" geometry.

The Pixel configuration needs to be added.
title: HLT customisation for 2016 detector
